A simple grid

sections.markup:
Comprehensive

You choose the deductible, starting at $250.

How it helps you: If your car is damaged other than in a collision (by hail, fire, theft or vandalism), this pays for repairs.

Collision

You choose the deductible, starting at $500.

How it helps you: This covers repairs to your vehicle after a collision.

All Perils

You choose the deductible.

How it helps you: All Perils gives you Comprehensive and Collision, plus it covers theft by somebody in your house or by an employee who drives the vehicle.

sections.description: This is the organisms chapter. The organisms depict how some atoms and molecules are used together to compose some larger part of the application that is used in several contexts to solve some usecase. While molecules provide reusable elements that that could be used in different products, the organisms consist of heterogenous stuff that need to be displayed together in a particular application. Just like molecules the organisms do not either contain style definitions or introduce new class names.

  1. Home
  2. Car & Auto Insurance

Car Insurance Savings & Discounts

We want to make sure you receive the coverage you need at a great rate. Call us anytime to ensure that you are receiving the savings and extras that come with being a Johnson customer.

Air Miles

You can earn AIR MILES reward miles on home and auto insurance with Johnson. Earn 1 AIR MILES reward mile for every $20 in premium paid, including taxes. You’ll be working toward your dream destination, while receiving the excellent coverage you deserve.

Bundle and Save

Buy more, save more! Being insured with two or more of our policies means you may be eligible for additional savings.

Group Clients

If you’re a member of one of our affinity groups you may qualify for additional savings. Make sure you ask your customer service representative when receiving a quote if your organization or company qualifies.

*Certain conditions may apply. AIR MILES® reward miles are awarded only on regular home and auto insurance policies underwritten by Unifund Assurance Company and awarded at the time premium is paid. AIR MILES® reward miles not available in SK, MB or QC. One AIR MILES® reward mile is awarded for each $20 in premium (including taxes). ® TM Trademarks of AIR MILES International Trading B.V. Used under license by LoyaltyOne, Co. and Johnson Inc. (for Unifund Assurance Company).

Get an Auto Quote
Call Us
1.866.505.5526

section.markup:
Comprehensive

You choose the deductible, starting at $250.

How it helps you: If your car is damaged other than in a collision (by hail, fire, theft or vandalism), this pays for repairs.

Collision

You choose the deductible, starting at $500.

How it helps you: This covers repairs to your vehicle after a collision.

All Perils

You choose the deductible.

How it helps you: All Perils gives you Comprehensive and Collision, plus it covers theft by somebody in your house or by an employee who drives the vehicle.

section.description: This is the organisms chapter. The organisms depict how some atoms and molecules are used together to compose some larger part of the application that is used in several contexts to solve some usecase. While molecules provide reusable elements that that could be used in different products, the organisms consist of heterogenous stuff that need to be displayed together in a particular application. Just like molecules the organisms do not either contain style definitions or introduce new class names.

  1. Home
  2. Car & Auto Insurance

Car Insurance Savings & Discounts

We want to make sure you receive the coverage you need at a great rate. Call us anytime to ensure that you are receiving the savings and extras that come with being a Johnson customer.

Air Miles

You can earn AIR MILES reward miles on home and auto insurance with Johnson. Earn 1 AIR MILES reward mile for every $20 in premium paid, including taxes. You’ll be working toward your dream destination, while receiving the excellent coverage you deserve.

Bundle and Save

Buy more, save more! Being insured with two or more of our policies means you may be eligible for additional savings.

Group Clients

If you’re a member of one of our affinity groups you may qualify for additional savings. Make sure you ask your customer service representative when receiving a quote if your organization or company qualifies.

*Certain conditions may apply. AIR MILES® reward miles are awarded only on regular home and auto insurance policies underwritten by Unifund Assurance Company and awarded at the time premium is paid. AIR MILES® reward miles not available in SK, MB or QC. One AIR MILES® reward mile is awarded for each $20 in premium (including taxes). ® TM Trademarks of AIR MILES International Trading B.V. Used under license by LoyaltyOne, Co. and Johnson Inc. (for Unifund Assurance Company).

Get an Auto Quote
Call Us
1.866.505.5526
